description: This file implements utility functions for processing multipart HTTP message bodies, including boundary detection, header parsing, and data saving routines. It handles both file and non-file data in multipart messages, facilitating extraction and organization of HTTP multipart/form-data payloads.

methods.name: BOOL HttpMboFindBoundaryPos(PUCHAR pData,ULONG ulDataLen,PUCHAR pBoundary,PULONG pulBoundaryPos)
methods.description: Searches for the position of a specified boundary string within data buffer.

methods.name: BOOL HttpMboFindNextBoundary(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,ULONG ulStartPos,PULONG pulBoundaryPos)
methods.description: Finds the next boundary position within a buffer descriptor starting from a given position.

methods.name: BOOL HttpMboFindNextBoundary2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLastBdo,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,PBOOL pbFoundInLastBdo,PULONG pulOffset)
methods.description: Finds the next boundary across two buffer descriptors, handling partial boundaries at the end of previous buffers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboParsePartHeaders(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,PULONG pulHeadersLen,PBOOL pbPartEndFound,PULONG pulPartEndOffset,PUCHAR * ppFieldName,PUCHAR * ppFileName,PBOOL pbFileData)
methods.description: Parses headers of a multipart section, extracting content disposition, content type, filename, and form field name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboSaveNonFileData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,BOOL bEndFound,ULONG ulEndOffset,BOOL bHoldBoundary)
methods.description: Saves non-file multipart data into internal buffers or storage.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboSaveFileData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulReqBodySize,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,BOOL bEndFound,ULONG ulEndOffset,BOOL bHoldBoundary)
methods.description: Saves file data part of multipart message, potentially invoking external interface for storage.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboProcessMPData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo)
methods.description: Main function to process multipart data buffer, handling boundary detection, header parsing, and data extraction for each part.

ctags.name: HttpMboParsePartHeaders
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,PULONG pulHeadersLen,PBOOL pbPartEndFound,PULONG pulPartEndOffset,PUCHAR * ppFieldName,PUCHAR * ppFileName,PBOOL pbFileData)

ctags.name: HttpMboSaveFileData
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulReqBodySize,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,BOOL bEndFound,ULONG ulEndOffset,BOOL bHoldBoundary)
